case.title: Any students ? struggling with uni fee? - 32 (London)
case.text:
Hello All,
Needless to say I will help you with money accomodation and expenses ...we can fix an amount per month so you know what you getting and plan accordingly ...also you need to be open minded easy going and aim to please ...I am just being direct here nothing is free in this world and if you are ok to give me some quality time in exchange of comforts then by all means reply ...This is a genuine ad so only reply if you are serious and with your pics please.
